We are a research group in the National Institute of Physics, University of the Philippines, Diliman. Founded in 2016, our overarching goal has been to better understand gravity in all its facets, from Solar System scales to the vast distances of the cosmos. We puzzle over fascinating questions in relativistic astrophysics, black hole physics, celestial dynamics, theoretical cosmology, and gravitational wave science, and try to gain insight using a variety of analytical and numerical tools. Through these efforts, and guided by an insistence on core values of honesty, integrity, free expression, cooperation, curiosity and hard work, we hope to slowly build a strong home for gravity and astrophysics research in this beautiful part of the world.
